title: Rune pages
body:
I have been searching the shop for over an hour now, and i literally cannot find rune pages anywhere
i need help

replies.body: *Simply was taken* is correct, if you ensure the sorting parameters on the left all say **Show All**, rune pages should pop right up!

Go to the shop
Click Gameplay
Where it says Tier its a clickable box on the left hand side
Click it and click show all
Runepages will be the first 2 options to buy
